tooltip_summ.item.auw.antifreeze_boots_l: Combine with boots on a crafting grid to add a partial freeze barrier.
tooltip_full.item.auw.antifreeze_boots_l: {SUMM} Line all armor pieces for full protection against frostbite and hypothermia.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.antifreeze_chestpl: Combine with chestplate on a crafting grid to add cooling and a partial freeze barrier.
tooltip_full.item.auw.antifreeze_chestpl: {SUMM} Line all armor pieces for full protection against frostbite and hypothermia.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.antifreeze_helmet_: Combine with helmet on a crafting grid to add a partial freeze barrier.
tooltip_full.item.auw.antifreeze_helmet_: {SUMM} Line all armor pieces for full protection against frostbite and hypothermia.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.antifreeze_legging: Combine with leggings on a crafting grid to add cooling and a partial freeze barrier.
tooltip_full.item.auw.antifreeze_legging: {SUMM} Line all armor pieces for full protection against frostbite and hypothermia.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.auto_chestplate_li: Combine with chestplate on a crafting grid to add a self-adjusting temperature lining. You only need one piece of ozzy liner per armor set!
tooltip_summ.item.auw.auto_leggings_line: Combine with leggings on a crafting grid to add a self-adjusting temperature lining. You only need one piece of ozzy liner per armor set!
tooltip_summ.item.auw.antiburn_boots_lin: Combine with boots on a crafting grid to add partial heat and fire protection.
tooltip_full.item.auw.antiburn_boots_lin: {SUMM} Protects only the wearer not the outer-armor. Line all armor pieces for best protection.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.antiburn_chestplat: Combine with chestplate on a crafting grid to add partial heat and fire protection.
tooltip_full.item.auw.antiburn_chestplat: {SUMM} Protects only the wearer not the outer-armor. Line all armor pieces for best protection.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.antiburn_helmet_li: Combine with helmet on a crafting grid to add partial heat and fire protection.
tooltip_full.item.auw.antiburn_helmet_li: {SUMM} Protects only the wearer not the outer-armor. Line all armor pieces for best protection.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.antiburn_leggings_: Combine with leggings on a crafting grid to add partial heat and fire protection.
tooltip_full.item.auw.antiburn_leggings_: {SUMM} Protects only the wearer not the outer-armor. Line all armor pieces for best protection.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.camouflage_boots_c: Combine with boots on a crafting grid to add some camouflage. Line all armor pieces for max stealth!
tooltip_summ.item.auw.camouflage_chestpl: Combine with chestplate on a crafting grid to add some camouflage. Line all armor pieces for max stealth!
tooltip_summ.item.auw.camouflage_helmet_: Combine with helmet on a crafting grid to add some camouflage. Line all armor pieces for max stealth!
tooltip_summ.item.auw.camouflage_legging: Combine with leggings on a crafting grid to add some camouflage. Line all armor pieces for max stealth!
tooltip_summ.item.auw.wetsuit_boots_line: Combine with boots on a crafting grid to add a partial wetness barrier.
tooltip_full.item.auw.wetsuit_boots_line: {SUMM} Add drysuit liners to all armor pieces for best results. Grants a linked Depth Strider enchantment to boots.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.wetsuit_chestplate: Combine with chestplate on a crafting grid to add a partial wetness barrier.
tooltip_full.item.auw.wetsuit_chestplate: {SUMM} Add drysuit liners to all armor pieces for best results.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.wetsuit_helmet_lin: Combine with helmet on a crafting grid to add a partial wetness barrier.
tooltip_full.item.auw.wetsuit_helmet_lin: {SUMM} Add drysuit liners to all armor pieces for best results. Grants a linked Respiration enchantment to helmets.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.wetsuit_leggings_l: Combine with leggings on a crafting grid to add a partial wetness barrier
tooltip_full.item.auw.wetsuit_leggings_l: {SUMM} Add drysuit liners to all armor pieces for best results.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.hydrating_vest_lin: Combine with chestplate on a crafting grid to add a water pouch that holds up to 40 'sips' of safe drinkable water.
tooltip_full.item.auw.hydrating_vest_lin: {SUMM} To increase the water the vest has access to, add a hydrating pouch insert to your helmet.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.hydrating_helmet_l: Combine with helmet on a crafting grid to add a small water pouch. Requires an accompanying hydrating vest to actually use stored water.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.lucky_boots_liner: Combine with boots on a crafting grid for a bit of extra luck when worn.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.lucky_chestplate_l: Combine with chestplate on a crafting grid to bring good fortune to the wearer.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.lucky_leggings_lin: Combine with leggings on a crafting grid to add some luck to your legs.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.happyhappyjoyjoy_l: Combine with your chestplate on a crafting grid to bring a little joy and happiness wherever you go.
tooltip_full.item.auw.happyhappyjoyjoy_l: {SUMM} Most helpful when greeting merchants before trading.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.boots_enchantment_: Combine with boots on a crafting grid to add a portable enchantment slot.
tooltip_full.item.auw.boots_enchantment_: {SUMM} BEFORE attaching the pocket you must 'fill it' with the enchantment you want by combining the empty pocket and the enchantment book on a crafting grid. Only enchantments suitable for footwear will work. WARNING: to retrieve your book from the pocket, you MUST use a Liner Snips with Silk Touch.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.chestplate_enchant: Combine with chestplate on a crafting grid to add a special pocket that binds one enchantment. Only enchantments suitable for a chestpiece will work.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.helmet_enchantment: Combine with helmet on a crafting grid to add a special pocket that binds one enchantment. Only enchantments suitable for headwear will work.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.leggings_enchantme: Combine with leggings on a crafting grid to add a special pocket that binds one enchantment. Only enchantments suitable for leggings will work.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.shocksorb_boots_co: Combine with boots on a crafting grid to boost damage defense.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.shocksorb_chestpla: Combine with chestplate on a crafting grid to boost damage and knockback defense.
tooltip_full.item.auw.shocksorb_chestpla: {SUMM} Multiple layers will increase the boost amount linearly with a similar increase to stamina loss and total armor weight.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.shocksorb_helmet_c: Combine with helmet on a crafting grid to boost damage defense.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.shocksorb_leggings: Combine with leggings on a crafting grid to boost damage and knockback defense.
tooltip_full.item.auw.shocksorb_leggings: {SUMM} Multiple layers will increase the boost amount linearly with a similar increase to stamina loss and total armor weight.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.inner_boots_paddin: Combine with boots on a crafting grid to add a touch of toughness.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.inner_chestplate_p: Combine with chestplate on a crafting grid to add a touch of steadfast toughness.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.inner_helmet_paddi: Combine with helmet on a crafting grid to add a touch of toughness.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.inner_leggings_pad: Combine with leggings on a crafting grid to add a touch of steadfast toughness.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.antifriction_boots: Combine with boots on a crafting grid to increase movement speed.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.antifriction_chest: Combine with chestplate on a crafting grid to reduce movement slowdown.
tooltip_full.item.auw.antifriction_chest: {SUMM} Add coating to all armor pieces for best effect.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.antifriction_helme: Combine with helmet on a crafting grid to improve flying speed.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.antifriction_leggi: Combine with leggings on a crafting grid to reduce movement slowdown.
tooltip_full.item.auw.antifriction_leggi: {SUMM} Add coating to all armor pieces for best effect.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.bethebee_boots_lin: Combine with boots on a crafting grid to help protect against stinging critters and prickly bushes.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.bethebee_chestplat: Combine with chestplate on a crafting grid to help protect against stinging critters.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.bethebee_helmet_li: Combine with helmet on a crafting grid to help protect against stinging critters.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.bethebee_leggings_: Combine with leggings on a crafting grid to help protect against stinging critters and prickly bushes.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.antiblast_boots_li: Combine with boots on a crafting grid to add fire and blast protection.
tooltip_full.item.auw.antiblast_boots_li: {SUMM} Protects only the wearer not the outer armor. Line all armor pieces for best protection.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.antiblast_chestpla: Combine with chestplate on a crafting grid to add fire and blast protection.
tooltip_full.item.auw.antiblast_chestpla: {SUMM} Protects only the wearer not the outer armor. Line all armor pieces for best protection.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.antiblast_helmet_l: Combine with helmet on a crafting grid to add fire and blast protection.
tooltip_full.item.auw.antiblast_helmet_l: {SUMM} Protects only the wearer not the outer armor. Line all armor pieces for best protection.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.antiblast_leggings: Combine with leggings on a crafting grid to add fire and blast protection.
tooltip_full.item.auw.antiblast_leggings: {SUMM} Protects only the wearer not the outer armor. Line all armor pieces for best protection.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.chestplate_awkward: Combine with chestplate on a crafting grid to add a membrane that can drip-feed any potion mixture over time.
tooltip_full.item.auw.chestplate_awkward: {SUMM} To (re)fill the membrane, first attach it to your chestplate, then on the same crafting grid add the potion (or moonshine tonic) to the altered chestplate. Unamended, a chestplate can hold up to 1000mB or 4 standard potion bottles. All potions must be of the same mixture.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.helmet_awkward_mem: Combine with helmet on a crafting grid to add a membrane that can drip-feed any potion mixture over time.
tooltip_full.item.auw.helmet_awkward_mem: {SUMM} This membrane provides only a tiny amount of storage (~5 uses); it is best used as a storage extension for a chestplate membrane or filled with a potion mixture that has a very long-lasting duration per dose.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.leggings_awkward_m: Combine with leggings on a crafting grid to double the reservoir capacity for potion available to a feeding membrane.
tooltip_full.item.auw.leggings_awkward_m: {SUMM} This membrane provides storage only, it requires an attached helmet or chestplate membrane to inject contents!
tooltip_summ.item.auw.streeetch_boots_li: Combine with boots on a crafting grid to furtheer exteend the reeach of a leggings membrane. Add plastic to the elastic.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.streeetch_chestpla: Combine with chestplate on a crafting grid to get a bit of eeextra reeeach. Just like Reeed Richards!
tooltip_summ.item.auw.streeetch_helmet_l: Combine with helmet on a crafting grid to further exteend the reeach of a chestplate membrane. More elastic for the fantastic.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.streeetch_leggings: Combine with leggings on a crafting grid to get a bit of eeextra reeeach. Just like EEElasti Girl!
tooltip_summ.item.auw.boots_midas_membra: Combine with golden boots on a crafting grid to add passive damage repair.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.chestplate_midas_m: Combine with a golden chestplate on a crafting grid to add passive damage repair. Keeps golden gear super shiny!
tooltip_summ.item.auw.helmet_midas_membr: Combine with a golden helmet on a crafting grid to add passive damage repair.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.leggings_midas_mem: Combine with golden leggings on a crafting grid to add passive damage repair. Keeps golden gear in top shape!
tooltip_summ.item.auw.boots_midas_skin: Combine with non-golden boots on a crafting grid to add a deceptive golden sheen.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.chestplate_midas_s: Combine with non-golden chestplate on a crafting grid to add a deceptive golden sheen.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.helmet_midas_skin: Combine with a non-golden helmet on a crafting grid to add a deceptive golden sheen.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.leggings_midas_ski: Combine with non-golden leggings on a crafting grid to add a deceptive golden sheen.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.goopak_cool: Right-click and hold to activate. Keep on hotbar for additonal cooling(-2) for stated time in tooltip. Single use.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.goopak_heat: Right-click and hold to activate. Keep on hotbar for additonal warming(+2) for stated time in tooltip. Single use.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.liner_snips: Combine with lined armor on a crafting grid to remove one layer of lining. Leaves reusable lining on grid.
tooltip_full.item.auw.liner_snips: {SUMM} Has infinite uses when used to remove basic warming and cooling liners only. ALWAYS retains liner amendments and contents for specialty liners.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.special_liner_snip: Combine with lined armor on a crafting grid to remove one layer of lining. Leaves reusable lining on grid. §bInfinite§7 §buses§7.
tooltip_full.item.auw.special_liner_snip: {SUMM} REQUIRES Silk Touch to retain any liner amendments and contents for specialty liners!
tooltip.auw.when_attached.label: When attached adds:
tooltip.auw.levelUp.label: §7Level-upgrade:§e %1$s
tooltip.auw.dosesleft.label: §7Feeder doses left:§e %1$d
tooltip.auw.sipsleft.label: §7%2$s sips left:§e %1$d
lining.auw.name: Name:
lining.auw.val.cling_wrap.purpose: §dPut something between you and stinky armor
